010package imagingbook.common.threshold.global;
011
012import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
013import imagingbook.common.threshold.Thresholder;
014
015/**
016 * <p>
017 * Common interface to be implemented by all global thresholders. See Sec. 9.1
018 * of [1] for an overview.
019 * </p>
020 * <p>
021 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
022 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
023 * </p>
024 * 
025 * @author WB
026 * @version 2022/08/01
027 */
028public interface GlobalThresholder extends Thresholder {
029        
030        /**
031         * Returns a single (global) threshold value for the
032         * specified histogram.
033         * 
034         * @param h a histogram (array of frequencies)
035         * @return a single (global) threshold value
036         */
037        public int getThreshold(int[] h);       // TODO: change return type to double?
038        
039        /**
040         * Returns a single (global) threshold value for the
041         * specified {@link ByteProcessor} (8-bit image).
042         * 
043         * @param bp a {@link ByteProcessor} (8-bit image)
044         * @return a single (global) threshold value
045         */
046        public default int getThreshold(ByteProcessor bp) {
047                int[] h = bp.getHistogram();
048                return getThreshold(h);
049        }
050        
051        @Override
052        public default boolean threshold(ByteProcessor ip) {
053                int q = getThreshold(ip);
054                if (q > 0) {
055                        ip.threshold(q);
056                        return true;
057                }
058                else {
059                        return false;
060                }
061        }
062        
063}
